title: Anyone know what condensed serif font this is?
content:
Does anyone know this font from british vogue

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-05-09 at 2.41.16 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214841/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-05-09%20at%202.41.16%20PM.png) | 590.25 KB |
| [Screen shot 2013-05-09 at 2.41.50 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214841/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-05-09%20at%202.41.50%20PM.png) | 835.89 KB |
author: Btype

comments.content: The y and k are distinctive. They make me think it's [Ambroise Std](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214841/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typofonderie/ambroise-std/regular/).
thanks. I'm sure it's probably a custom cut, as it's from British vogue, but any similar suggestions are great.
